oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Estrous detection and timed AI protocols: complementary not mutually exclusive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chebel, Ricardo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: reproductive programs
dairy cattle
artificial insemination
AI
estrus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The goal of this brief review is to evaluate whether reproductive programs for lactating dairy cows may be solely dependent on timed AI protocols or AI on detected estrus. A few examples of dairies that have attempted to eliminate one or the other will be given, but I caution that some of these examples are merely data extracted from on farm software and not the result of controlled studies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2012; 123-128
